name: Silent-Tree
description:
Silent Tree is a side scrolling game 2D in pixel art, where the player will have to resolve puzzles to help the Tree of Life. It's a "creative week" game, so be indulgent ...

Goal : resolve puzzles to save the tree : if you are to slow, the tree of life will die

Movements : Z, Q, S, D

Interaction : E

Jump : Space
